# Disposal of the FV Atlantic Pursuit
## Brief Description
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking proposals from interested suppliers to dispose of the FV Atlantic Pursuit through Ship Breaking.

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: PW-MER-002-28779
- **Solicitation Number**: F6140-220281/A
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 15, 2022
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Upon successful bidder selection
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

## Description of Requirement
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (Small Craft Harbours) requires the disposal of the FV Atlantic Pursuit through Ship Breaking. The successful bidder will be required to prepare the vessel for transportation, transport the vessel to an approved site, and dismantle and recycle or dispose of the vessel in an environmentally responsible manner. The work must be completed in accordance with the Statement of Work - Annex A.

## Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Trade Agreement with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK
